name: Gearbreed
text: During your Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw: You can add 1 Equip Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand. If you control an Equip Spell: You can place 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 Gemini monster from your GY on the bottom of your Deck; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Gearbreed" once per turn.
